title: Rooftop Beauty Study
summary: A classic beauty portrait made on a New York City rooftop, using black and white to emphasize structure, gaze, and timeless fashion elegance.
story: This piece leans into the essentials of fashion beauty—clarity, attitude, and presence—stripping away distraction so the viewer stays with expression and form.
technique: Rooftop beauty portrait in black and white; controlled framing and tonal contrast focused on facial structure and eyes.

title: Natural Light Rooftop Portrait
summary: A fashion portrait captured on a New York City rooftop using only natural light—direct, minimal, and emotionally charged.
story: Memorable for its simplicity and presence, this portrait became an award-winning image—proof that a strong moment and honest light can carry an entire frame.
technique: Rooftop fashion portrait using available natural light only.
quote: Honest light can carry an entire frame.

title: Skyline Editorial
summary: Fashion against the Manhattan skyline—editorial elegance meeting urban grandeur.
story: The city as backdrop, the model as protagonist. Classic rooftop fashion photography.
technique: Wide framing to include skyline context with fashion subject.

title: Above the City
summary: A portrait with nothing but sky behind—clean, elevated, timeless.
story: Sometimes the best backdrop is no backdrop at all. Just sky and presence.
technique: Low angle shooting against open sky for clean background.
